news.title: Robert Plant Announces New Album, Shares Cover of Low’s “Everybody’s Song”: Listen
news.summary: The cover leads the former Led Zeppelin singer’s new album, Saving Grace, which is out in the autumn via Nonesuch

news.title: Watch the Trailer for New Documentary It’s Never Over, Jeff Buckley
news.summary: The Amy Berg–directed film premiered at Sundance earlier this year

news.title: Netflix Shares First Teaser Video for Stranger Things’ Final Season: Watch
news.summary: New episodes of the fifth season begin rolling out in the autumn

news.title: Listen to David Byrne’s New Song “She Explains Thing to Me”
news.summary: Another selection from the Talking Heads frontman’s solo album Who Is the Sky?

news.title: Kronos Quartet Enlist Ringo Starr, Iggy Pop, Willie Nelson, and Many More for Star-Studded Bob Dylan Covers: Listen
news.summary: Two new renditions of Dylan’s “A Hard Rain’s a-Gonna Fall” memorialize the 80th anniversary of the Trinity test

news.title: Whitney Announce New Album, Share Video for New Song “Dandelions”: Watch
news.summary: The Chicago-based band led by Max Kakacek and Julien Ehrlich will release Small Talk in November
